erDiagram
  PERSON ||--o{ ADDRESS : lives_at
  PERSON {
    string name PK
  }
  ADDRESS {
    string street
    string city
  }
---
+----------------+      +------------------+    
| PERSON         |lives_| ADDRESS          |    
+----------------+||--o{+------------------+    
| PK string name |      |    string street |    
+----------------+      |    string city   |    
                        +------------------+
